name: initialize Scenes
func:
flow.set("current_scene_idx", 0)
flow.set("max_scene_idx", 4)
flow.set("scenes", [
        {   scene_idx: 0,
            scene_name: "aus",
            devices: [
                {   device_idx: 1,
                    name: "Tiffany",
                    state: "off"
                },
                {   device_idx: 2,
                    name: "Fensterbank",
                    state: "off"
                },
                {   device_idx: 3,
                    name: "Klavierlampe",
                    state: "off"
                },
                {   device_idx: 4,
                    name: "Leuchter",
                    state: "off"
                }
            ]
        },
        {   scene_idx: 1,
            scene_name: "ambiente",
            devices: [
                {   device_idx: 1,
                    name: "Tiffany",
                    brightness: 70,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 2,
                    name: "Fensterbank",
                    brightness: 70,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 3,
                    name: "Klavierlampe",
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 4,
                    name: "Leuchter",
                    state: "off"
                }
            ]
        },
          {   scene_idx: 2,
            scene_name: "cosy",
            devices: [
                {   device_idx: 1,
                    name: "Tiffany",
                    brightness: 150,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 2,
                    name: "Fensterbank",
                    brightness: 150,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 3,
                    name: "Klavierlampe",
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 4,
                    name: "Leuchter",
                    state: "off"
                }
            ]
        },
        {   scene_idx: 3,
            scene_name: "sofa_read",
            devices: [
                {   device_idx: 1,
                    name: "Tiffany",
                    brightness: 100,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 2,
                    name: "Fensterbank",
                    brightness: 255,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 3,
                    name: "Klavierlampe",
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 4,
                    name: "Leuchter",
                    state: "off"
                }
            ]
        },
      {   scene_idx: 4,
            scene_name: "bright",
            devices: [
                {   device_idx: 1,
                    name: "Tiffany",
                    brightness: 255,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 2,
                    name: "Fensterbank",
                    brightness: 255,
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 3,
                    name: "Klavierlampe",
                    state: "on"
                },
                {   device_idx: 4,
                    name: "Leuchter",
                    brightness: 255,
                    state: "on"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
)

return {payload: 0};
